mapper.update: UPDATE reply SET CONTENT=#{content} WHERE COMMENT_ID=#{comment_id} and USER_ID=#{user_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY(CONTENT, COMMENT_ID, USER_ID, MOVIE_ID) VALUES(#{content}, #{comment_id}, #{user_id}, #{movie_id})
INSERT INTO REPLY(CONTENT, RE_REPLY_ID, COMMENT_ID, USER_ID, MOVIE_ID) VALUES(#{content}, #{reply_id}, #{comment_id}, #{user_id}, #{movie_id})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM REPLY WHERE COMMENT_ID=#{comment_id} and USER_ID=#{user_id} and MOVIE_ID=#{movie_id} and re_reply_id is null;
DELETE FROM REPLY WHERE COMMENT_ID=#{comment_id} and USER_ID=#{user_id} and MOVIE_ID=#{movie_id} and re_reply_id=#{re_reply_id} and reply_id=#{reply_id}
mapper.select: select a.nickname, b.profile_img, c.reply_id, c.content, c.write_time, c.modify_time, c.re_reply_id, c.comment_id, c.user_id, c.movie_id from user a join user_detail b on a.id=b.user_id join reply c on c.user_id=a.id where c.comment_id=#{comment_id} and c.user_id=#{user_id} and c.re_reply_id IS NULL;
